title: Twenty-five acre coconut plantation in Mundalama
details:
This is a great opportunity to own a working twenty-five acre coconut plantation on the West Coast near Mundalama. The plantation has been well maintained and has been subject to a managed replanting programme to sustain cropping levels. A distribution chain is in place with a local coconut wholesaler.

There is a possibility to add a further five acres, also managed as a coconut plantation, giving a total price of $342,000 for thirty acres.
